high_descs: Walk forward across the room to the window.
Pick up the yellow pencil near the window.
Turn around, walk forward slightly, then turn left and walk to the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: move forward to the white cabinet that is below the window
pick up the yellow pencil that is to the left of the green pencil from the top of the cabinet
turn around and move a few steps to the small desk on the left, turn to the left to face the desk
turn on the lamp that is in the left back corner of the smaller desk
anns.task_desc: examine a pencil by the light of the lamp on the smaller desk

high_descs: Go across the room to the chest under the window.
Pick up the pencil to the right of the chest board, on the chest.
Turn around and go to the left side of the desk to your left.
Turn on the lamp in the right, back corner of the desk.
